trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded"> </xref> 의 이벤트는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
Handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event is useful when you want to determine the error for a row depending on its state and the values it contains.
trans-unit.target: 처리는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>의 상태와 포함 된 값에 따라 행에 대 한 오류를 확인 하려는 경우 이벤트가 유용 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event and specify error text in the handler, an error glyph appears in the row header unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowRowErrors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 처리 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>이벤트 오류 텍스트에에서 지정 된 처리기를 오류 문자 모양과 행 머리글에 표시 하지 않는 한는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowRowErrors%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성이 `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowRowErrors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: When the user moves the mouse pointer over the error glyph, the error text appears in a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 오류 문자 위로 마우스 포인터를 이동할 때 오류 텍스트 도구 설명에 나타납니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>이벤트는 또한 될 때마다 발생의 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성을 검색 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> property to determine the state or value of a row, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>속성을 상태 또는 행의 값을 확인 하 고이 정보를 사용 하 여 변경 하거나 수정 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 행의 값으로 초기화 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>이벤트 값을 무시 하는 속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> value for multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: 처리는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>많은 행을 설정의 작업할 때 이벤트 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>여러 행에 대 한 값.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [Windows Forms DataGridView 컨트롤의 크기 조정에 대 한 유용한](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 처리 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [NIB: 이벤트 사용](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the error text for the row.
trans-unit.target: 행에 대 한 오류 텍스트를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property initially contains the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property if it has been set for a row.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성의 값을 처음에 포함 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>행에 대해 설정 된 경우 속성을 사용 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The ErrorText property value displays as a ToolTip for the error glyph in the row header.
trans-unit.target: ErrorText 속성 값이 있는 행 머리글의 오류 문자에 대 한 도구 설명으로 표시합니다.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the error text for the row.
trans-unit.target: 행에 대 한 오류 텍스트를 나타내는 문자열입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the row that raised the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded"></xref> event.
The zero based row index for the row.
trans-unit.target: 0 기반된 행 인덱스 행에 대 한 합니다.
